name: Space Fantasy
description:
Modifications:

1.) Add 3 unique and increasingly more difficult levels

2.) Changed all the UI to be more futuristic

3.) Changed enemies to be slimes with unique animations like death and idle and changed the pickups designs 

Created by: Rio Lyon
